title: Add BookmarkCardCompact variant
description: Create a compact card variant for dense list views.
acceptance_criteria:
- Smaller card with less whitespace
- Toggle between grid and compact views
- BookmarkList component for table/list view

title: Implement Keyboard navigation
description: Add keyboard shortcuts for navigating bookmarks and lists.
acceptance_criteria:
- Arrow keys to navigate cards
- Enter to open bookmark
- Escape to close modals
- / to focus search

title: Implement Favourites view
description: Add a dedicated view for favourited bookmarks.
acceptance_criteria:
- Route for favourites (e.g., /favourites)
- Filter by favourited: true
- Link in sidebar or header

title: Implement Search functionality
description: Build the search page (/search) with client-side interactivity for searching bookmarks.
acceptance_criteria:
- Route: /search
- Search input in header triggers search
- Results displayed in BookmarkGrid
- Client-side interactivity for real-time search
close_reason: Search functionality complete: Header search routes to /search, dedicated SearchInput component with debounced real-time updates (300ms), clear button, auto-focus, URL syncing. Smart lists (Inbox, Tagless) get special treatment without search input.

title: Implement Home page with recent bookmarks
description: Build the home page (/) showing featured/recent bookmarks using Server Components with ISR.
acceptance_criteria:
- Route: /
- Fetches recent bookmarks via API
- Displays BookmarkGrid with cards
- Server Component with ISR/static generation
close_reason: Home page already implemented: fetches recent bookmarks via API, displays BookmarkGrid with cards, uses Server Components. Route / is working.

title: Implement Tag filtering
description: Add TagFilter component for multi-select tag filtering on bookmark views.
acceptance_criteria:
- TagFilter component with multi-select
- Filter bookmarks by selected tags
- Show tag counts
- Works on list pages and search

title: Implement Bookmark detail page
description: Add /bookmark/[id] page for single bookmark detail view with full AI summary and notes.
acceptance_criteria:
- Route: /bookmark/[id]
- Full screenshot display
- Complete AI summary (not truncated)
- User notes if present
- All metadata visible

title: Enhancements: Polish & Extra Features
description: Nice-to-have features beyond the MVP - tag filtering, favourites, dark mode, keyboard navigation, and more.
acceptance_criteria:
- Tag filtering functionality
- Favourites view
- Dark mode toggle
- Keyboard navigation
- Additional view options

title: MVP: Core Bookmark Library
description: Build the minimum viable product for the Karakeep frontend - a beautiful, browsable bookmark library with editorial/magazine aesthetic inspired by aesthete.alephic.ai.
acceptance_criteria:
- Next.js 14+ app with App Router initialized
- Karakeep API integration working
- Sidebar with list navigation
- Card grid with screenshot previews
- Basic search functionality
- Responsive design
- Distinctive typography (not Inter/Roboto)
close_reason: MVP complete! All acceptance criteria met: Next.js 14+ with App Router, Karakeep API client, sidebar with 18 lists (smart + hierarchical), BookmarkCard/Grid with screenshots, search with debounced real-time updates, responsive layout, Fraunces editorial typography.

title: Create layout shell with Sidebar
description: Build the main layout with left sidebar for list navigation (with icons), header with search bar, and minimal footer. Sidebar should be collapsible on mobile.
acceptance_criteria:
- Sidebar component with list navigation and icons
- Header component with search bar placeholder
- Footer component (minimal)
- Responsive: sidebar collapses on mobile
- Editorial/magazine aesthetic with generous whitespace
close_reason: Created layout shell with Sidebar, Header, Footer, MobileNav, and AppShell components. Editorial/magazine aesthetic with warm cream/terracotta color scheme, Fraunces display font, monospace category headers, and responsive mobile navigation.

title: Build Karakeep API client
description: Create data fetching utilities for the Karakeep API endpoints: get-lists, search-bookmarks, get-bookmark. Include asset URL helper.
acceptance_criteria:
- getLists() - fetch all lists with hierarchy
- searchBookmarks() - search/paginate bookmarks
- getBookmark() - fetch single bookmark by ID
- getAssetUrl() - construct asset URLs for screenshots
close_reason: Created Karakeep API client in src/lib/karakeep.ts with getLists(), searchBookmarks(), getBookmark(), getAssetUrl() and helper functions

title: Build BookmarkGrid component
description: Create a responsive grid layout for displaying BookmarkCard components.
acceptance_criteria:
- Responsive grid (adapts to screen size)
- Proper spacing and alignment
- Works with BookmarkCard component
close_reason: Built BookmarkGrid component with responsive columns (1→2→3/4), compact variant support, customizable empty states, integrated into home page.

title: Add Sort options
description: Add SortSelect component to sort bookmarks by date, title, etc.
acceptance_criteria:
- SortSelect dropdown
- Sort by: date (newest/oldest), title (A-Z/Z-A)
- Persist preference

title: Initialize Next.js 14+ project with App Router
description: Set up the Next.js project with Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, and distinctive typography (Instrument Serif/Fraunces for display, Söhne/Untitled Sans for body).
acceptance_criteria:
- Next.js 14+ with App Router
- Tailwind CSS configured
- shadcn/ui initialized
- Custom fonts configured (not Inter/Roboto)
- Environment variables for KARAKEEP_API_URL and KARAKEEP_API_KEY
close_reason: Project initialized with Next.js 16, Tailwind CSS 4, shadcn/ui, Fraunces + Geist typography, and warm editorial color palette

title: Implement Tags browse page
description: Add /tags page to browse all tags and /tag/[name] for bookmarks with specific tag.
acceptance_criteria:
- Route: /tags - browse all tags
- Route: /tag/[name] - bookmarks with specific tag
- Tag cloud or list view

title: Create TypeScript type definitions
description: Define TypeScript interfaces for Bookmark, List, Tag, and API responses based on the Karakeep schema.
acceptance_criteria:
- Bookmark interface with all fields
- List interface with hierarchy support
- Tag interface with attachedBy field
- Asset interface for screenshots/images
close_reason: Created TypeScript type definitions in src/types/index.ts with Bookmark, List, Tag, Asset interfaces and helper functions

title: Implement Dark mode
description: Add dark mode support with toggle in header.
acceptance_criteria:
- Dark mode color scheme
- Toggle button in header
- Persist preference (localStorage)
- Respect system preference

title: Implement List pages with dynamic routing
description: Build the list view page (/list/[slug]) showing bookmarks filtered by list. Support hierarchical lists and smart lists (Inbox, Tagless).
acceptance_criteria:
- Route: /list/[slug]
- Fetches bookmarks for specific list
- Supports child lists (e.g., Dev > UI)
- Supports smart lists (Inbox: -is:inlist, Tagless: -is:tagged)
- Displays BookmarkGrid with cards
close_reason: Implemented /list/[id] dynamic route with static generation, /search page for smart lists (Inbox, Tagless, etc.), breadcrumb for child lists, and proper empty states. All 18 lists pre-rendered at build time.

title: Build BookmarkCard component
description: Create the main bookmark card component featuring large screenshot previews as the hero element, title, AI-generated summary, tags, favicon, and date.
acceptance_criteria:
- Large screenshot preview (hero element)
- Title and AI summary (not truncated aggressively)
- Tag chips showing AI vs human tags
- Favicon and date metadata
- Subtle hover states and transitions
- Links to original URL
close_reason: Built BookmarkCard and BookmarkCardCompact components with: large hero screenshots, AI vs human tag distinction (AI tags show sparkle icon, human tags get primary color), full summaries (line-clamp-4 default, expandable), favicon + date + source metadata, favourited indicator, subtle hover animations, compact variant for dense layouts. Integrated into home page.

title: Add Source filtering
description: Add SourceFilter component to filter bookmarks by source (rss, extension, mobile, api).
acceptance_criteria:
- SourceFilter component
- Filter by rss/extension/mobile/api
- Works alongside TagFilter
